info.title: Livesuite API
info.description: API for tracking Livesuite livestreams, analytics, and metrics

description.example: We all like to remain Anon.

isCurrentlyLive.description: Whether the streamer is currently live

tokenDescription.example: We all like to remain Anon.

endTime.description: Session end time (null if still active)

isActive.description: Whether the session is currently active

numParticipants.description: Number of participants in the session

totalViewers.description: Total number of current viewers across all streams

totalStreamingTime.description: Total streaming time across all streamers in seconds

longestActiveSession.description: Duration of longest currently active session in seconds

description.example:
WOИƎ⅄ MONEY | $WONEY

The Currency of Memes | Upside Down Money

6bunJ76HV9SCDHkukezST3VKzQKJ8JtjTQQ92UD7pump

followerThreshold.description: Follower threshold for high follower status

highFollower.description: Whether account meets high follower threshold

lastFetched.description: When Twitter data was last fetched

isCurrentlyLive.description: Whether the streamer is currently live

twitterAge.description: Twitter account age as formatted string

telegram.description: Telegram URL (can be empty or null)

is_currently_live.description: Whether the streamer is currently live

trending_description.example: PlaiPin Launches Following Creator's Y Combinator Hackathon Success

reasons.description: List of reasons for the botting analysis

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive financial analytics including token age, viewers, market cap distribution, and market data

200.description: Financial analytics including token age, viewers, market cap distribution, and market data

currentViewers.description: Current total viewers across all streams

marketCapDistribution.description: Distribution of tokens by market cap ranges

streamersWithMarketCapData.description: Number of streamers with market cap data available

totalMarketCap.description: Total market cap across all tokens

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the data was generated

cached.description: Whether the response was served from cache

get.description: Retrieve user engagement and interaction analytics including bubble charts, donut charts, engagement trends, growth metrics, and session metrics

donutChart.description: Donut chart data showing session modes

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the data was generated

cached.description: Whether the response was served from cache

200.description: Analytics overview including global stats and live metrics

timestamp.description: When the stats were calculated

totalStreamingTime.description: Total streaming time across all streamers in seconds

totalViewers.description: Total number of current viewers across all streams

timestamp.description: When the live metrics were calculated

get.description: Retrieve heatmap data including consistency data, daily hourly activity, and monthly calendar activity

hourlyActivity.description: Activity counts by day-hour combination (format: day-hour)

daysInMonth.description: Number of days in the month

startDayOfWeek.description: Day of week the month starts on (0-6)

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the data was generated

cached.description: Whether the response was served from cache

get.summary: Analyze token for view botting patterns
get.description: Analyzes a specific token's viewer data to detect potential view botting using advanced pattern recognition

mintId.description: Token mint ID that was analyzed

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the analysis was performed
Timestamp when the data was generated

cached.description: Whether the response was served from cache

404.description: Token not found or no data available

get.description: Returns comprehensive statistics about the botting detection service performance and usage

bottingDetected.description: Number of tokens flagged for botting

averageProcessingTime.description: Average analysis processing time in milliseconds

post.summary: Analyze multiple tokens for view botting patterns
post.description: Performs bulk analysis on up to 50 tokens to detect view botting patterns efficiently

mintIds.description: Array of token mint IDs to analyze

get.description: Retrieve value scores for tokens including consistency, engagement, attention per dollar, viewer score, and total value score

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the data was generated

429.description: Rate limit exceeded - 1 request per second per IP

get.description: Retrieve comprehensive global platform statistics including total streamers, live count, and viewer metrics

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the data was generated

cached.description: Whether the response was served from cache

parameters.name: hours
parameters.description: Number of hours to look back for metrics

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of metrics snapshots to return

currentActiveTime.description: Total active time across all current sessions in seconds

longestActiveSession.description: Duration of longest currently active session in seconds

timestamp.description: Timestamp for this metric snapshot

totalStreamingTime.description: Total streaming time across all streamers in seconds

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the data was generated

endTime.description: End time of the data range

startTime.description: Start time of the data range

get.summary: Get creator fees for a specific token
get.description: Get creator fees for a specific token by looking up creator address automatically via Solana Tracker

parameters.name: tokenAddress
parameters.description: Token mint address (will lookup creator address via Solana Tracker)

fees24h.description: Fees collected in the last 24 hours

fees24hFormatted.description: Fees in last 24 hours formatted as string

fees7d.description: Fees collected in the last 7 days

fees7dFormatted.description: Fees in last 7 days formatted as string

interval.description: Time interval for the fees data

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the data was generated

cached.description: Whether the response was served from cache

404.description: Token not found or no creator fees data available

post.summary: Get creator fees for multiple tokens
post.description: Get creator fees for multiple tokens in a single request for efficient bulk processing

data.description: Object mapping token addresses to their creator fees data

fees24h.description: Fees collected in the last 24 hours

fees24hFormatted.description: Fees in last 24 hours formatted as string

fees7d.description: Fees collected in the last 7 days

fees7dFormatted.description: Fees in last 7 days formatted as string

interval.description: Time interval for the fees data

timestamp.description: Timestamp when the data was generated

uniqueCreators.description: Number of unique creator addresses found
